Name: Mangy Wolves
Description: Starving wolves desperate for some meat.

Name: Bandit Hedgewizard
Description: A mere dabbler in the Craft, but with some true power nonetheless.

Name: Balthazor's Apprentice
Description: A follower of the cult of Balthazor.

Name: Hobgoblin Shaman
Description: Its spells may be crude, but they still have a bite.

Name: Kobold Mage
Description: Underestimating it was the last mistake many adventurers made.

Name: Dire Wolf
Description: A snarling beast nearly twice the size the average wolf.

Name: Tentacled Thing
Description: Almost invisible until you are almost upon it.

Name: Shrieker
Description: A hideous cross between a vulture and a banshee.

Name: Restless Spirit
Description: Find the right ritual, and it will be banished like fog before sunshine.

Name: Guild Enforcer
Description: A lifetime of hunting down thieves has taught him much about dirty fighting.

Name: Licensed Magehunter
Description: His fervour shields him from all magical attacks.

Name: Highland Banshee
Description: Her scream can rip the very foundations from nearby crypts.

Name: Sanctioned Bounty-Hunter
Description: Someone's put a price on your hero's head.

Name: Lizardman Raider
Description: Damp, scaly, and fishy.  Fast, though, and their steel's as good as any other.

Name: Stone Elemental
Description: A powerful being forged of soil and stone.

Name: Storm Elemental
Description: The very heart of a summer's storm.

Name: Fire Elemental
Description: A living inferno, barely tamed by a mage's will.
